sentences.en: A dictionary may define genetics as simply " the science of the study of heredity ".
sentences.cn: 词典上会把遗传学简单地定为 “ 研究遗传的科学. ”

sentences.en: Botany, zoology, biochemistry and molecular biology, cell biology, microbiology, genetics, fermentation engineering.
sentences.cn: 植物学, 动物学, 生物化学与分子生物学, 细胞生物学, 微生物学, 遗传学, 发酵工程.

sentences.en: Cancer genetics, somatic mutagenesis, DNA repair, genomics and molecular medicine.
sentences.cn: 肿瘤发生的遗传机制; 体细胞突变的发生机制; DNA修复, 基因组学与分子医学.

sentences.en: For multiple - marker analysis , Xu ( Genetics, 2003, 163:789 - 801 ) developed a Bayesian shrinkage estimation ( BSE ) method.
sentences.cn: 对于前者, Xu ( Genetics, 2003, 163:789-801 ) 首先提出了Bayesian压缩估计方法.

sentences.en: Genetics is also bringing about dramatic changes in our understanding of cancer.
sentences.cn: 遗传学也正使我们对癌症的理解发生巨大的变化。

sentences.en: Genetics: Color mutation - The Hypo Boa is a Co - dominant or incomplete dominant trait.
sentences.cn: 遗传学: 彩色突变 - 该次宝儿是共同主导的或不完整的主要特征.

sentences.en: He gave me a piece of advice on how to learn genetics.
sentences.cn: 他就如何学好遗传学给我提出了一条建议.

sentences.en: Objective To probe into the molecular genetics basis for para - Bombay phenotype.
sentences.cn: 目的研究类孟买型血型的分子基础.

sentences.en: Parsons has reviewed the population genetics literature.
sentences.cn: Parsons给种群遗传学文献写了书评.

sentences.en: Population genetics owes its origin to Francis Galton.
sentences.cn: 体遗传学的创立应归功于弗朗西斯·高尔顿.

sentences.en: Smoking, rather than genetics, was the cause of his early demise.
sentences.cn: 导致他英年早逝的原因是吸烟而非遗传。

sentences.en: The formal genetics of mammalian cells has been dependent on breeding experiment with whole organisms.
sentences.cn: 哺乳动物细胞的表型遗传学取决于整个机体的繁殖实验.

sentences.en: The study of psychology has recently been widely cross-fertilized by new discoveries in genetics.
sentences.cn: 心理学研究最近从遗传学的新发现中受益匪浅。

sentences.en: These include the canvas extractors developed by the Institute of Forest Genetics at Placerville California.
sentences.cn: 其中包括加利福尼亚的泼拉崖维尔森林遗传研究所创造的帆布提取器.

sentences.en: This article reviews the molecular mechanism and genetics of vascular cognitive impairment.
sentences.cn: 文章就血管性认知障碍的分子机制和遗传学等方面做了综述.

sentences.en: This is the essential thesis of molecular genetics, sometimes called the central dogma.
sentences.cn: 这就是分子遗传学的基本论点, 或称中心法则.
